Package org.pikater.core.utilities.evolution

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FitnessEvaluator
    Interface for the evaluation of all individuals in the population at once.
    FitnessFunction
    An interface for all fitness function.
    Replacement
    The replacement decides, which of the parents and offspring are considered by the environmental selection at the end of each generation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EvolutionaryAlgorithm
    The main class which is responsible for the run of a single generation of the evolutionary algorithm.
    MergingReplacement  
    Population
    A container which contains the individuals of a population.
    RandomNumberGenerator
    Wrapper for the java.util.Random.
    SGAReplacement
    Simple replacement as is done in the Simple Genetic Algortihm (i.e. the parents are dropped).
    SimpleEvaluator
    A simple instance of the FitnessEvaluator class.
    StatsLogger
    This class serves as a logging interface for logging of the progress of fitness and the objective of the individual.
